The Last of Us 2 represents how games sh: As much as I wanted to impulsively rate this very low\, I will attempt to give an open minded review.PROS:Game looks phenomenalGame play is smoothAudio and music is on pointMoments of real feeling and relating to the characterCONS:Story line...... wtf & whyCharacter model (abby) not consistent and unrealisticToo much push on LGBTQPoor choice of over all message during sensitive pandemicSo let me explain my 6 rating.. It would have been much much higher... There were just certain aspects that made me almost quit... Aside from the obvious\, in your face LGBTQ\, which became almost comical\, it was Abbys character model that was so ridiculous and unsightly. It was never consistent. He beefy muscles fluctuated in size from scene to scene. Maybe not so damning if you werent forces to play her so long.....Then there was the story... Dear lord.. the story.. The first ends on a note of love and going to extremes for those you love.... But this one.... hate\, revenge\, loss\, grief.. It tore down Ellie and Joels character to the point I didnt even like Ellie at the end...For me.... This was just a heinous act at such a sensitive time. We are all suffering a pandemic. We have been locked inside. Little to look forward to in 2020. For some... waiting YEARS for this game\, saw a glimmer of hope in the release of this game..... I would not be surprised if this game threw some into a deeper depression. Reckless and there was no need to degrade our beloved characters to the point they did....… Expand
